body:
The `modules.json` bug I mentioned above is [bug 1347709](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1347709), which has a patch in review and should land shortly. After further testing, I don't think `.eslintignore` is required.

I think getting eslint working in automation will be easy; we can use `mach eslint` on TaskCluster for it. I'd like to make eslint work outside of that as well, though, for things like editor integrations and therapist.
